title: I got bored and did maths on the new Fiora's vitals.
body:
In an achievable situation for a hyper carry, Fiora actually does better than Vayne.

If at level 18, Fiora takes one scaling attack damage mark, and all her other marks and quintessences are flat (this is very close to the typical ADC rune page, except for a single mark), has 1 (not 5) stacks of dragon buff, which you'll very likely get at some point in the game, and your items are

{{item:3077}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3139}} 

For the sake of practicality, her HP is maximum.

and your masteries are:

3 points in Brute Force mastery
1 point in Martial Mastery mastery
3 points in Warlord mastery

you would have:
((80x4)+(0.95x8)+2.43+(2.25x3)+4+10+60+75)x1.06x1.05 AD which is 540 bonus AD, her base AD is not counted, but she would have 667 total at level 18, as her base AD is 114.

Her passive, vitals, gives percentage true damage.
3% (+「 2.7 + (0.1 × Fiora's level)% 」per 100 bonus AD)
At max level it would be 3 + 4.5 Per 100 bonus AD
She has 5 bonus 100 AD so she would get
(3 + 4.5 * 5) %
25.5% Damage dealt as true percentage damage per hit in a vital.

She can get up to 48~% if she goes the ridiculous route and takes attack damage seals and glyphs, fully stacked sword of occult, and is below 30% health with malmortius. But I'm using an optimal situation where she doesn't try and screw over her anything-but-late-game, and she also has to be chuck norris. 

This means, in the hands of a skilled player, she can kill anything in four hits, she also has mercurial scimitar for CC guys if she gets unlucky, and Maw of Malmortius for damage guys. Unless that person is Mundo, or has A Soraka

This makes her an even MORE hyper carry than Vayne.

Whether she's like Nasus and Vayne, balanced by the fact she won't get to level 18 with all those items or too much stacks due to her early game, is another matter entirely. She's also melee without much defense.

ADC Fiora FTW.

EDIT: I can see her becoming like Kog'Maw. Everyone picks support champs and towards middle game they just buff her with so many shields and auras she can jump into the enemy team and practically 1v5 them

The downvotes I get for doing a bit of math simply because "omgnotpracticalimafiorafanboi" is ridiculous

That build really isn't that viable, though. Fiora is melee; she can't be built as a glass cannon. The only defensive stats in your sample build are the magic resist from Maw and Mercurial. So sure, she could in theory kill anything in four hits, but with that build someone on the enemy team has screwed up if she gets close enough for one. After playing new Fiora in normals a whole bunch, she feels really well-balanced to me.

In top, of course, but if you have a focus-worthy support at bot or some strong CC or sustain, like Leona, Soraka or Morganna, Fiora can potentially be the first melee AD carry, scaling off her support's effectiveness rather than her own DPS.
